text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) xai-org/x-algorithm | 96% | stars now 1590 → est 16907 (range 16882-16932)
   https://github.com/xai-org/x-algorithm
2) vercel-labs/agent-browser | 95% | stars now 8433 → est 17294 (range 17239-17349)
   https://github.com/vercel-labs/agent-browser
3) different-ai/openwork | 95% | stars now 3769 → est 9511 (range 9485-9537)
   https://github.com/different-ai/openwork
4) originalankur/maptoposter | 94% | stars now 5695 → est 10297 (range 10256-10338)
   https://github.com/originalankur/maptoposter
5) affaan-m/everything-claude-code | 94% | stars now 4002 → est 20504 (range 20474-20534)
   https://github.com/affaan-m/everything-claude-code

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
